column4: can i get some help setting up samba? here's where i'm stuck: http://pastebin.com/d5964d31e
nslookup does not work with samba (netBIOS) names .. only DNS .. either configure samba for netBIOS name resolution, or put entries for the names you want to resolve in /etc/hosts
can you help me get samba working?
this might be a complement to the name resolution issue .. http://oreilly.com/catalog/samba/chapter/book/ch07_03.html
i wonder if i could order this book on the companies dime
the weird thing is, if i go Places -> Network -> Windows Network, AVAAK shows up
and if i click on it, SERV1 shows up
but clicking on that gives a pause followed by an empty folder
i would expect it to prompt me for username pw
i'm reading that page, but there's a lot of vocabulary i'm unfamiliar with on it
